bug.short_desc: Text field input is broken on Android 4.4

long_desc.thetext: Go to Mobile Showcase demo application, Form Elements. Focus text field, type one character. Notice caret position is before character typed, so subsequent characters appear before the first one. Type few more characters. Tap at the end of the text so that caret moves to the end, after the last character. Hit backspace on the virtual keyboard. Notice last character is erased expected, but caret jumps to the beginning of text, before the first character.

This might be caused by a fix for Android 4.x and the liveupdate setting of the input field.
